page.title: 10CHURCHES IN EAST BANGOR
page.content: There are 3 churches in our area. they are Towerview Free Methodist, Ballyholme Methodist and Ballyholme Presbyterian. Towerview Free Methodist was built about 5 years ago while Ballyholme Presbyterian was built about 20 years ago.I belong to the Presbyterian Church.Morning service starts at 11.30 and ends at 12.30 a.m.The evening service starts at 6.45 p.m.and ends at 7.45. At Ballyholme Presbyterian there are quite a few Sunday Schools. Primary Sunday School _ for 4 to 7 year olds. Junior Sunday School _ 7-11 years Junior Bible Class _ 11-14 years Senior Bible Class _ 14-17 years In Groomsport there is a Presbyterian Church and a Church of Ireland one. Many Bangor people attend these.
